chapter.title: Resource Adaptor Type
chapter.para: The Resource Adaptor Type is the interface which defines the contract between the RA implementations, the SLEE container, and the Applications running in it.
The name of the RA Type is XCAPClientResourceAdaptorType, its vendor is org.mobicents and its version is 2.0.
The RA Type uses its own XCAP Client API, with an implementation built on top of Apache HTTP Client 4.x, for further information about the Apache API refer to its website at .
